argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_dmfi | |- ( A e. Fin -> dom A e. Fin ) |
| 2 |  | #P_rnfi | |- ( A e. Fin -> ran A e. Fin ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_jca | |- ( A e. Fin -> ( dom A e. Fin /\ ran A e. Fin ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_xpfi | |- ( ( dom A e. Fin /\ ran A e. Fin ) -> ( dom A X. ran A ) e. Fin ) |
| 5 |  | #P_relssdmrn | |- ( Rel A -> A C_ ( dom A X. ran A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_ssfi | |- ( ( ( dom A X. ran A ) e. Fin /\ A C_ ( dom A X. ran A ) ) -> A e. Fin ) |
| 7 | 4, 5, 6 | #P_syl2anr | |- ( ( Rel A /\ ( dom A e. Fin /\ ran A e. Fin ) ) -> A e. Fin ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_ex | |- ( Rel A -> ( ( dom A e. Fin /\ ran A e. Fin ) -> A e. Fin ) ) |
| 9 | 3, 8 | #P_impbid2 | |- ( Rel A -> ( A e. Fin <-> ( dom A e. Fin /\ ran A e. Fin ) ) ) |
